title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for March 24-31, 2025
description: The WoF answers from March 24 to 31. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for March 24-31, 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today during the final weeks of March 2025. We'll have the Fan Friday word as well.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll see the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today from March 24 to March 31, 2025. The solutions for every round as well as the final bonus round and the toss-ups will be updated daily, so we recommend that you check back if you want to know the latest answers. This week has been dubbed Chasing Sunsets, which is similar to a lot of the earlier weeks about vacations, so some of the solutions should be beach-related. For specifics, the solutions here are for the standard, syndicated version of the show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White (we’ll have the solutions to Celebrity Wheel of Fortune once it’s no longer delayed). Tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Todd Meyer, Latricia Randolph, and Sheree Corder. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for March 31. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, March 31, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – WHOOP IT UP [Phrase] Tossup #1 – EXPECT THE UNEXPECTED [Travel Tip] Tossup #2 – MODEL AIRPLANE KIT [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – RENAISSANCE FAIRE [Fun Festivals] Regular Puzzle #2 – ANIMAL, DECORATIONS, TIME, BUS [Crossword – Party ___] Regular Puzzle #3 – A TREMENDOUS ESCAPE [Event] Tossup #3 – RING ON MY FINGER [Wordplay] Tossup #4 – RING AROUND THE COLLAR [Wordplay] Tossup #5 – THREE-RING CIRCUS [Wordplay] Regular Puzzle #4 – DANCING IN THE DARK [Song Title] Here are the puzzle answers for Friday, March 28: Bonus Round Puzzle – ON OUR WAY [Phrase] Tossup #1 – FISH TACOS [Food & Drink] Tossup #2 – TAMPA BAY, FLORIDA [On The Map] Regular Puzzle #1 – ISLAND-HOPPING ON ONE FOOT [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #2 – SEEING THE GREEN FLASH [Event] Regular Puzzle #3 – TAKE A SHOWER UNDER A WATERFALL [Colorful Language] Tossup #3 – ONCE IN A BLUE MOON [Colorful Language] Tossup #4 – COMPLETELY OUT OF THE BLUE [Colorful Language] Tossup #5 – BLUE-PLATE SPECIAL [Colorful Language] Regular Puzzle #4 – WE’RE IN THE HOME STRETCH [Phrase] Fan Friday – HOME Here are the puzzle answers for Thursday, March 27: Bonus Round Puzzle – THE BIG FINALE [Event] Tossup #1 – VOLLEYBALL PLAYERS [People] Tossup #2 – SOUTHEAST ASIA [On The Map] Regular Puzzle #1 – BLOWING INTO A CONCH SHELL [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #2 – HARBOR SEAL OF APPROVAL [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – ACHIEVING PEAK RELAXATION [Event] Tossup #3 – CONCENTRATE [Rhyme Time] Tossup #4 – CONTEMPLATE [Rhyme Time] Tossup #5 – PROCRASTINATE [Rhyme Time] Regular Puzzle #4 – OOPS! I DID IT AGAIN [Song Title] Regular Puzzle #5 – OPULENT RESORT [Place] Here are the puzzle answers for Wednesday, March 26: Bonus Round Puzzle – DOWN TO THE WIRE [Phrase] Tossup #1 – GIANT BEACH TOWER [Living Things] Tossup #2 – THE WILD ROBOT [Movie Title] Regular Puzzle #1 – MY FAVORITE MOVIE SOUNDTRACK [Showbiz] Regular Puzzle #2 – DEPOSIT SLIP OF THE TONGUE [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – DRINK WITH A TINY UMBRELLA [Happy Hour] Tossup #3 – FINANCIAL PLANNER [Occupation] Tossup #4 – ECONOMIST [Occupation] Tossup #5 – PROFESSIONAL POKER PLAYER [Occupation] Regular Puzzle #4 – I TOLD YOU SO [Phrase] Here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, March 25: Bonus Round Puzzle – WAIT FOR IT [Phrase] Tossup #1 – STROLLING ON THE SHORE [Life’s A Beach] Tossup #2 – GRADUATION SPEAKER [Person] Regular Puzzle #1 – SLAP ON THE BACK TO THE FUTURE [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #2 – SEE THE LINE WHERE THE SKY MEETS THE SEA IT CALLS ME [Song Lyrics] Regular Puzzle #3 – FUZZY NAVEL [Happy Hour] Tossup #3 – BIG BANG THEORY [Thing] Tossup #4 – THEORY OF RELATIVITY [Thing] Tossup #5 – CONSPIRACY THEORY [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – A LUXURIOUS SETTING [Place] Here are the puzzle answers for Monday, March 24: Bonus Round Puzzle – PAIR OF WHITE GLOVES [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #1 – DOLPHINS THAT PLAY [Living Things] Tossup #2 – LOUD MUSIC ON THE BEACH [Pet Peeve] Regular Puzzle #1 – MATING & PRANK CALL [Same Name] Regular Puzzle #2 – SHARKS, REEFS, SURF, SWIM [Crossword – Life’s A Beach] Regular Puzzle #3 – DOUBLE RAINBOW [Thing] Tossup #3 – DINNERTIME [Event] Tossup #4 – PARTY TIME [Event] Tossup #5 – NAPTIME [Event] Regular Puzzle #4 – BREATHING A SIGH OF RELIEF [What Are You Doing?] Here are the puzzle answers for Friday, March 21: Bonus Round Puzzle – FILM FOOTAGE [Showbiz] Tossup #1 – STRANGERS ON A TRAIN [Movie Title] Tossup #2 – FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #1 – MAKE A CHECKLIST [Travel Tip] Regular Puzzle #2 – THE BEST THINGS IN LIFE ARE FREE DELIVERY [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – PERFECT PLATE OF PASTA [Food & Drink] Tossup #3 – CUTTING A RUG [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #4 – CUTTING THE CAKE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #5 – CUTTING TO THE CASTLE [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – ORCHESTRA CONDUCTOR [Person] Fan Friday – PINT As usual for this season, the Fan Friday contest by Collette is still live. The Fan Friday word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some point during the March 28 episode. Wheel Watchers watching in Los Angeles have access to the Wheel Wednesdays Giveaway where they can win $1,000 every Wednesday through April 2.
html:
Here you’ll see the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today from March 24 to March 31, 2025. The solutions for every round as well as the final bonus round and the toss-ups will be updated daily, so we recommend that you check back if you want to know the latest answers.

This week has been dubbed Chasing Sunsets, which is similar to a lot of the earlier weeks about vacations, so some of the solutions should be beach-related. For specifics, the solutions here are for the standard, syndicated version of the show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White (we’ll have the solutions to Celebrity Wheel of Fortune once it’s no longer delayed). Tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Todd Meyer, Latricia Randolph, and Sheree Corder. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for March 31.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, March 31, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Tossup #1 – EXPECT THE UNEXPECTED [Travel Tip]

  • Regular Puzzle #4 – DANCING IN THE DARK [Song Title]

Here are the puzzle answers for Friday, March 28:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – ON OUR WAY [Phrase]

Wheel Watchers watching in Los Angeles have access to the Wheel Wednesdays Giveaway where they can win $1,000 every Wednesday through April 2.
